Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: pkgutil
Description: Query and manipulate for macOS Installer packages and receipts

Arguments.Name: -h
Arguments.Description: A brief summary of commands and usage

Arguments.Name: -f
Arguments.Description: Skip confirmation before a potentially destructive or ambiguous action

Arguments.Name: -v
Arguments.Description: Output in a human-readable format

Arguments.Name: --volume
Arguments.Description: Perform all operations on specified volume

Arguments.Name: volume
Arguments.Description: volume

Arguments.Name: --edit-pkg
Arguments.Description: Specifies an existing receipt to be modified in-place by --learn

Arguments.Name: package-id
Arguments.Description: package-id

Arguments.Name: --only-files
Arguments.Description: List only files (not directories) in --files listing

Arguments.Name: --only-dirs
Arguments.Description: List only directories (not files) in --files listing

Arguments.Name: --regexp
Arguments.Description: Use regex to match package-id arguments, if an exact match isn't found

Arguments.Name: --pkgs
Arguments.Description: List all installed package IDs, optionally matching kwarg REGEXP, on the specified --volume

Arguments.Name: REGEXP
Arguments.Description: REGEXP

Arguments.Name: --packages
Arguments.Description: List all installed package IDs on the specified --volume

Arguments.Name: --pkgs-plist
Arguments.Description: List all installed package IDs, in Mac OS X plist(5) format, on the specified --volume

Arguments.Description: List all of the files installed under the package-id
